channel.title: Algorithm on Learn with AI
channel.description: Recent content in Algorithm on Learn with AI

item.title: 空间复杂度分析
item.description: 习题预习 User ask: 给我5题Space Complexity Analysis的问题 ChatGPT answer: What is the space complexity of a recursive algorithm that calls itself n times? How many bits are required to store an array of n integers? What is the space complexity of a queue data structure that can hold up to n elements? How much memory is required to store a binary search tree with n nodes? What is the space complexity of an iterative algorithm that uses a stack with space for n elements?
